title: Best of the Program | Guest: Robby Soave | 1/23/20
description:
Joe Biden’s presidential campaign sent instructions to the media warning that it’s “journalistic malpractice” to report that the Burisma allegations against him are anything but “debunked.” Glenn warned in 2004 that truth will become entertainment, and now the Democrats are eating their own. Now there are three groups of Democrats, from the radicals to the forgotten majority who are tired of the “Church of Woke.” Robby Soave, senior editor at Reason.com, joins to look back at how opinion and journalism have become synonymous, one year after the media’s Covington Catholic fiasco.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
